body_html:
As suggested with the error message, could you try after setting -Dorg.tensorflow.NativeLibrary.DEBUG=1 in the JVM? That will provide additional information about what's missing.

Regardless, do fill out the issue template including ideally a minimal, complete, verifiable set of steps to reproduce.
body_text:
As suggested with the error message, could you try after setting -Dorg.tensorflow.NativeLibrary.DEBUG=1 in the JVM? That will provide additional information about what's missing.
Regardless, do fill out the issue template including ideally a minimal, complete, verifiable set of steps to reproduce.
body:
As suggested with the error message, could you try after setting `-Dorg.tensorflow.NativeLibrary.DEBUG=1` in the JVM? That will provide additional information about what's missing.

Regardless, do fill out the issue template including ideally a [minimal, complete, verifiable](https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve) set of steps to reproduce.
